content: Another example, I noticed that many of the guests who came to our club for events, such as weddings or company retreats, had a hard time finding local vendors for things like photography or floral arrangements. As a server, I have a good relationship with many of the local vendors and I thought I could use this to my advantage to help our guests. So, I took the initiative to create a list of recommended vendors in the area, including their contact information and specialties, and I made it available to guests upon request. This helped many of our guests to find the right vendors for their events and I was glad to play a small part in making their event special. It was a
